    Stand up comedy

    I've recently started dabbling with stand up comedy. Just a few open mic comedy nights to get the blood pumping, so I'll not be booking the Hammersmith Apollo any time soon.

    This page is a record of my previous and upcoming gigs.

    Upcoming gigs

    • 05 January 2016 Comedy in the Crown - The Crown, St Albans
    • 27 January 2016 Comedy in the Yurt - The Blacksmiths Arms, St Albans
    • 14 March 2016 Jester Jester - The Bestsy Trotwood, London

    Previous gigs

    • 08 December 2015 Comedy in the Crown Christmas Special - The Crown, St Albans
    • 10 November 2015 Comedy in the Crown - The Crown, St Albans
    • 13 October 2015 Comedy in the Crown (MC) - The Crown, St Albans
    • 29 September 2015 Comedy in the Crown - The Crown, St Albans
    • 12 August 2015 Party Piece - Smiths of Smithfields, Spitalfields, London
    • 25 June 2015 Freedom Fridge - The Rose and Crown, Kentish Town, London
    • 26 May 2015 TNT - The Vine, Kentish Town, London
    • 17 April 2015 Underdogs - Blue Posts, Picadilly Circus, London
    • 07 April 2015 Party Piece - Shaker & Company, Euston, London
    • 31 March 2015 TNT - The Vine, Kentish Town, London
    • 23 March 2015 We Are Funny Projects - Dirty Dicks, Liverpool Street, London
